body:
Dear colleagues,


I am working on the second volume of the Daylighting Handbook and for the simulation chapter I am looking for high quality Radiance visualization, preferably one that features great architecture and ideally some non-standard Radiance materials. If you have such a visualization and you are willing to share it with me for the book, please let me know.


All the best,


Christoph
Christoph Reinhart
Associate Professor
Department of Architecture
Massachusetts Institute of Technology
77 Massachusetts Ave, Rm 5-418, Cambridge, MA 02139, USA
t: 617 253 7714, f: 617 253 6152, creinhart at mit.edu<mailto:creinhart at mit.edu>
Sustainable Design Lab<http://mit.edu/SustainableDesignLab/> | Daylighting Handbook I<http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/069220363X> | DIVA<http://www.diva4rhino.com/> | Daysim<http://daysim.ning.com/> | mapdwell<http://www.mapdwell.com/> | umi<http://www.urbanmodeling.net/>
___
